entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning.
